attributes.action: Make New Year’s eve fireworks to display NHS and key workers names for COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: I want government to do it because it will show that we still care and that we still honour all the people that have helped us this year
attributes.background: If this petition gets through, the new year’s eve fireworks will display some of the key workers names and nhs staff that have helped during the pandemic

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for New Year’s Eve fireworks
